function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of social networking apps for data collection and distribution.","Impact":"Potential for spreading contagious diseases through shared devices and close contact during data collection.","Mitigation":"Implement contactless data collection methods, use of personal devices, and enforce social distancing during distribution.","Technologies":"Digital survey platforms, contactless QR code scanning, and virtual meeting apps.","People":"Participants, data collectors, and individuals involved in data distribution.","Owner":"Research team, data collectors, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Large number of participants from all Indonesian regions.","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to individuals from different geographic locations with varying disease prevalence and transmission rates.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict hygiene protocols, require testing and quarantining for participants from high-risk areas, and limit in-person interactions.","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, testing facilities, and contact tracing apps.","People":"Participants, research team, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Research team, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Close contact during data collection using social networking apps.","Impact":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases through in-person interaction during data collection activities.","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing, use of personal protective equipment, and implement regular testing for data collectors.","Technologies":"Digital survey platforms, contactless QR code scanning, and virtual meeting apps.","People":"Participants, data collectors, and individuals involved in data collection.","Owner":"Research team, data collectors, public health authorities."}]}
